title: How does a good character lead to a conflict resolution? - Quora

response.answer_text: when you are known to have good character, people are more willing to trust you, to believe you when you say you'll do things differently in the future, you'll follow thru with your commitments, etc. Also, if you have good character, you may also be more willing to believe in others ' good character, to believe they are acting in good faith.
